lead_paragraph: The N.B.A. referee Joey Crawford was reinstated by Commissioner David Stern, five months after he was suspended indefinitely for improper on-court conduct. Tim Duncan, the San Antonio Spurs star, said that Crawford challenged him to a fight during a game against the Dallas on April 15. Crawford ejected Duncan while Duncan was laughing on the bench. Stern cited a pattern in suspending Crawford. But Stern met with Crawford and said he was satisfied that Crawford knew what “the N.B.A. expects from him.”.
